<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi">VFABI</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">/// LLVM Internal VFABI ISA token for vector functions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#af33ac7943ba16e891cd1b6e307029301"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#af33ac7943ba16e891cd1b6e307029301">&#95;LLVM&#95;</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;LLVM&#95;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Prefix for internal name redirection for vector function that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">/// tells the compiler to scalarize the call using the scalar name</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of the function. For example, a mangled name like</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#96;&#95;ZGV&#95;LLVM&#95;N2v&#95;foo(&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;foo)&#96; would tell the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vectorizer to vectorize the scalar call &#96;foo&#96;, and to scalarize</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it once vectorization is done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a3b4aafd885099e61903f0a29e638a8b1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a3b4aafd885099e61903f0a29e638a8b1">&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;LLVM&#95;Scalarize&#95;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Function to construct a VFInfo out of a mangled names in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">/// following format:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt;&#123;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">/// where &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt; is the name of the vector function, mangled according</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to the rules described in the Vector Function ABI of the target vector</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extension (or &lt;isa&gt; from now on). The &lt;VFABI&#95;name&gt; is in the following</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">/// format:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#95;ZGV&lt;isa&gt;&lt;mask&gt;&lt;vlen&gt;&lt;parameters&gt;&#95;&lt;scalarname&gt;&#91;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This methods support demangling rules for the following &lt;isa&gt;:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; AArch64: https://developer.arm.com/docs/101129/latest</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; x86 (libmvec): https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">///  https://sourceware.org/glibc/wiki/libmvec?action=AttachFile&amp;do=view&amp;target=VectorABI.txt</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param MangledName -&gt; input string in the format</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#95;ZGV&lt;isa&gt;&lt;mask&gt;&lt;vlen&gt;&lt;parameters&gt;&#95;&lt;scalarname&gt;&#91;(&lt;redirection&gt;)&#93;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param FTy -&gt; FunctionType of the scalar function which we&#39;re trying to find</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a vectorized variant for. This is required to determine the vectorization</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">/// factor for scalable vectors, since the mangled name doesn&#39;t encode that;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it needs to be derived from the widest element types of vector arguments</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// or return values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">std::optional&lt;VFInfo&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a46c9ccb087f925d00317f16577410a13">tryDemangleForVFABI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> MangledName,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;FTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Retrieve the &#96;VFParamKind&#96; from a string token.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add480f2ed87faa59c16d4c01ffb4bf39">VFParamKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#aaf19acac548dca3c8f263ceb6a860b57">getVFParamKindFromString</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Token);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Name of the attribute where the variant mappings are stored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a11875601ee512fa1f5cf6b6354c8def9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a11875601ee512fa1f5cf6b6354c8def9">MappingsAttrName</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;vector-function-abi-variant&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Populates a set of strings representing the Vector Function ABI variants</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// associated to the CallInst CI. If the CI does not contain the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vector-function-abi-variant attribute, we return without populating</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// VariantMappings, i.e. callers of getVectorVariantNames need not check for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the presence of the attribute (see InjectTLIMappings).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a8adf44ad04562ff150b0e8e352a38d46">getVectorVariantNames</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &amp;CI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;std::string&gt;</a> &amp;VariantMappings);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Constructs a FunctionType by applying vector function information to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// type of a matching scalar function.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param Info gets the vectorization factor (VF) and the VFParamKind of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">/// parameters.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param ScalarFTy gets the Type information of parameters, as it is not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stored in \\p Info.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns a pointer to a newly created vector FunctionType</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a7ae16889db439f8fbb234fe3de672d11">createFunctionType</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/vfinfo">VFInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/functiontype">FunctionType</a> &#42;ScalarFTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Overwrite the Vector Function ABI variants attribute with the names provide</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in \\p VariantMappings.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/vfabi/#a9ad2ee389fa99a4c02f610183530735c">setVectorVariantNames</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;std::string&gt;</a> VariantMappings);</Highlight></CodeLine>
